message:
Hello guys, 

I cant stop thinking about Mirai Botnet DDOS, i keep following the news to see it growing each day, the problem here is there are millions of unsecured IoT  devices that Mirai will acquire and the DDOS will get harder and harder each time, is there anyone interested in the same topic, does you know how this gonna stop, or they how they gonna batch all of those unsecured devices, what will happen after a year when this Botnet doubled several time ?
